name: sfpwowerscript-validatetestcoveragepackage-task
friendlyName: Validates Code Coverage of an Unlocked Package
description: Validates code coverage of an unlocked package provided the package version id, This task is part of SFPowerscripts
author: dxatscale@accenture.com
instanceNameFormat: Validate  Apex Tests  Coverage for  $(test_coverage) % for package $(package_version_id)

inputs.name: target_org
inputs.label: Alias or username of the DevHub
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the DevHub against which the package version was created

inputs.name: test_coverage
inputs.label: Code coverage % to be validated
inputs.helpMarkDown: The percentage of code coverage, that should be validated

inputs.name: package_version_id
inputs.label: Package Version Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The package version id which has to be validated
